overview:
Innovative thinker, impassioned leader, outside the box achiever with a take charge and not give up attitude. Accomplished sales professional with 10 years of proven success. Diverse experience from startups, non profits, and global fortune 100 companies.

Enthusiastic individual who is passionate in all endeavors. Effective trainer, manager, motivator, and team builder. Proficient in penetrating highly competitive markets. Delivering quantifiable results. High energy, humorous demeanor and so friendly that he puts you at ease as soon as you meet him. A wacky and fun loving side. (Ex. #HHHDay) Believes that positivity is the most important attribute to any successful individual. (It’s even part of his company’s core beliefs)

Personable business professional who has a craving for constant and continuous learning. Sets and exceeds goals routinely. Capable of constructive criticism and able to apply learned knowledge from mentors/advisors. Such as: Ian Karnell founder of One to One Global Paul Gardi VP of Search of AskJeeves Tom Burgess founder of Linkable Networks Scott Case founder of Priceline Jeff Taylor founder of Monster

Currently he is founder and CEO of SKINNYprices which is a plug-in for e-commerce companies that gives them an unfair competitive pricing advantage with huge savings for their customers by creating a thrilling marketplace of continuously decreasing product prices paid for by video advertising. This international PATENT PENDING technology will create value and a symbiotic relationship for the consumer, advertiser and e-commerce company.

Passionate Inventor: Cool-A-Can (Co2 can that self cools) Radiant Light Toaster (Can toast in 10 seconds) The Parallel Binder (Device to make parallel skiing easy) Forced Air Lifter (Device that you slide under object that uses hovercraft model to lift and move) Clutch Lock (Device that locks the motorcycle clutch at the handle bar)

Top 3 sales consultants in entire country while working for Home Depot “At Home Services”

He made States for High Jump and can jump 6 foot 3 inches

Licenses Certified Contractor: He has built decks 4 Season Rooms Kitchens Bathrooms

Avid DIYer: Finished basement Finished Attic Blew out wall in kitchen and put commercial giant frig/freezer combo Installed the electrical for his own 220 volt Hot tub Installed wood floor and tile floor Installed Fence and is installing 25 foot rolling driveway gate

Additional Information: Lives on the ocean in Quincy with a view of the city Built his own in-ground pool Built a 10ft by 20ft floating island Owns a hovercraft Races Motorcycles Has Bungee jumped Has sky dived Flew and landed a plane Certified Diver
